title: Associations between traffic-related air pollution and allergic rhinitis outpatient visits in three cities of Gansu Province
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00234B, Paper
Hongran Ma, Furong Qu, Jiyuan Dong, Jiancheng Wang
Emerging evidence indicates an increasing prevalence of allergic rhinitis (AR), potentially linked to air quality.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
